metadata.description:
Soul Food Aint Fast Food.

SoulFood (a recorded I originally co-produced with my brothers Ashton Woods & HeizenBURR!) is a song that changed my life. My good friend Rascal took it upon himself to surprise me with a remix to this staple in catalog and the flip has been stuck in the vault for some time now. As we embark on Art Basel to expand this world we're building here in web 3, it only felt right to give you all something to move your bodies and feed your soul.

Please Enjoy.

Join the #VibeHaus Collectors Chat: 
https://guild.xyz/vibehaus-tribe

Written & Performed by Scolla Fungwe
Additional vocals by Chechi Sarai
Produced by Tobias "Rascal" Breuer
Engineered & Mixed by Ashton Woods
Artwork by Scolla Fungwe

lyrics.text:
[Intro]
Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
OG, OG, OG
Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah, yeah
I said this that, this that shit, that hits your soul, that hits your soul
This that, this that shit, that hits your soul, that hits your
I said this that, this that shit, that hits your soul, that hits your soul
In the madness, protect your magic

[Verse 1]
Today I woke up feeling like the man though (huh)
Got a little bit of money and I'm finna roll up this weed
Ain't got two fucks to give and even less for sucker shit
I swear you're talking to the baddest brother
So I'm thinking I might swipe my flex card
Might piss my Ex off
Might call my whole click like lets spend this check y'all
I'm OG and you know that
So grab a frame for my Kodak
This celebrating of elevated sensations, is pimpin' baby
[Chorus]
Now this that, this that shit that hit yo soul that hit yo
Now Now Now, This that, This that shit that hit yo soul that hit yo
I said now, This that, This that shit that hits yo soul that hits yo
Now Now Now, This that shit, That shit that hit yo soul that hit yo
Hey!

[Verse 2]
I left footprints on the ceiling, tryna stay a step above
My girl's sun bathing on the moon, While I'm moonwalking on the sun
Cheers to my niggas that was with me from the jump
Thanks to the people down to catch me from the fall
This for them niggas down to meet me with the pump
And this for me praying that I never have to call
And I don't know why, I love love but it suits me just fine
I'ma treat you like a beauty of mine
Such a fool, Such a fool
Dumb enough to know the truth
Wise enough to know there's more that we can do
In this world of mine

[Chorus]

[Verse 3]
Supersize my greens
Make that there with some good loving
Feed the child in my dreams
Tell em this about time good's coming
Free yourself, Touch the world
Kill the hate, Love the girl
Move something
Take a fall, Learn to fly
Talk to God, Touch the high
Do Something

[Bridge]
I
Stayed down til I came up
Broke Bread with my stay true niggas
Thank God that I ain't you niggas
Thank God for this day I
Stayed down til I came up
Broke Bread with my stay true niggas
Thank God that I ain't you niggas
Thank God for this plate dog

Feed my mind, feed my soul
I can't get enough and
I won't get enough of the love
Love
Love like your fearless
And fight to the finish cuz
Love's been a mission in my soul

This a love jones
This a love jones
Oh yeah

This a love jones
This a love jones
I swear

[Chorus]

metadata.name: SoulFood (Rascal Flip) #1
